name: You're The Fish
description:
A simple game about a fish who finds a pair of dentures on the ocean floor.

Best if played full screen. And with a mouse.

Submission for Godot Wild Jam 41.

Don't have a mouse? Use the 'F' key to click (zoomie) and the 'D' key to left click (chomp).

Bug Notes: 

- Forgot to make some last minute tweaks, so the pacing is a little off. Don't forget to sink some yachts before you beat the game!
- Epilogue doesn't completely disappear :(

Native Builds: I submitted this literally last second and didn't have time to upload the executable files. Sorry!

Software Used:  Godot, Aseprite

If you aren't judging for the Godot Wild Jam, here's another version that runs a little better than the one on itch.io's servers: https://game.chiquit.ooo/urthefish/
